generalInfo.title: Please complete the registration form for the best possible experience.
generalInfo.textFieldLabel: Describe in short your professional status
generalInfo.helperText: Inputs with the * sign are required

experience.title: Describe your professional experience. Maximum 70 characters.

languages.title: Please select the language in which you would like to study and cooperate.

categories.title: Please choose the main subjects based on the category. You can add others later.

photo.description: Please upload a photo that represents you and helps others recognize you.
